MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned shutdown of the electricity supply affecting the SY13 postcode area of Ash Parva affecting properties in The Meadows and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am due to damaged equipment on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:29am on 23rd April 2021.
